questions.question: What was the impact of print culture on the society in the 19th century?

options.A: It led to the spread of literacy.
options.C: It decreased the number of books published.
options.D: It was only popular among the elite.

questions.question: How did the printing press contribute to the Reformation?

options.A: By allowing the mass production of religious texts.
options.B: By promoting the Catholic Church's teachings.
options.C: By limiting access to religious information.
options.D: By creating a monopoly on book publishing.

questions.question: What role did newspapers play in the freedom struggle in India?

options.A: They were used to spread nationalist ideas.
options.B: They were banned by the British government.
options.C: They had no role in the freedom struggle.
options.D: They only catered to the upper class.
